title: Is it Resilience, or Are You Just Naive? | Ask Daily Stoic
description:
Weâ€™ve talked before about the so-called Stockdale Paradoxâ€”the blazing determination inside Admiral James Stockdale that allowed him to believe that, despite his imprisonment and torture, he would not only survive but thrive because of his experience. Thereâ€™s something similar in Meditations where Marcus Aurelius, reflecting on the plague and the wars and the troubles that beset his reign, actually says to himself, â€œItâ€™s fortunate that this happened to me.â€
